meanings.definition: Serving as a sign or indication
meanings.sent1: The dark clouds were indicative of an approaching storm.
meanings.sent2: Her smile was indicative of her happiness.
meanings.sent3: The barking dog was indicative of the mailman's arrival.
meanings.sent4: The sudden drop in temperature was indicative of the changing seasons.
meanings.sent5: The red traffic light is indicative of stopping.
